title: Mah Scooters Standalone December 2025 Net Sales at Rs 6.44 crore, up 11.23% Y-o-Y
author: Broker Research
content:
Reported Standalone quarterly numbers for Maharashtra Scooters are:Net Sales at Rs 6.44 crore in December 2025 up 11.23% from Rs. 5.79 crore in December 2024. Quarterly Net Profit at Rs. 4.12 crore in December 2025 up 24.85% from Rs. 3.30 crore in December 2024. EBITDA stands at Rs. 5.56 crore in December 2025 up 16.08% from Rs. 4.79 crore in December 2024. Mah Scooters EPS has increased to Rs. 3.60 in December 2025 from Rs. 2.90 in December 2024. Mah Scooters shares closed at 12,952.00 on January 09, 2026 (NSE) and has given -8.60% returns over the last 6 months and 42.27% over the last 12 months.
